last_episode_to_air.name: Viceroy
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Hart in grave danger, the team must find their own way to stop Ramsey before his plan to assassinate a senator starts a war with international terrorists.

name: Taken
overview: The origin story of younger, hungrier, former Green Beret Bryan Mills as he deals with a personal tragedy that shakes his world. As he fights to overcome the incident and exact revenge, Mills is pulled into a career as a deadly CIA operative, a job that awakens his very particular, and very dangerous, set of skills.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: The murder of Bryan Mills' sister launches him into a dangerous mission for revenge against cartel boss Carlos Mejia. A secret US intelligence agency, led by Christina Hart, covertly uses Bryan as bait to capture Mejia, and in the end recruits Bryan to become a part of their team.

episodes.name: Ready
episodes.overview: Bryan gets his first chance in the field but the mission goes bust, resulting in a tragic death. The team uncovers a group of government officials skimming off of refugee funds, which also leads Christina to reconnect with a long lost love. Meanwhile, Asha shows up unexpectedly at Bryan's doorstep.

episodes.name: Off Side
episodes.overview: Bryan and team search for a suspected terrorist who has been taken, leading them to uncover a deeper plot within their own government. Christina receives troubling news and turns to Harry for support. Asha expresses her concern over Bryan's fixation with Mejia.

episodes.name: Mattie G.
episodes.overview: Riley's insistence to uncover the truth behind a fatal drug given to war vets results in her asset's child being taken. Bryan defies orders to rescue the girl and uncover the truth. When a break-in at Asha's apartment leaves her shaken, a new neighbor is there to calm her nerves.

episodes.name: A Clockwork Swiss
episodes.overview: Christina orders the retrieval of sensitive documents in Zurich needed to prevent economic and political disaster. But the mission to break into a bank vault turns into a three-way battle, and a race to escape safely. Meanwhile, Asha's trust in Elena proves to be misplaced and leaves Bryan vulnerable.

episodes.name: Hail Mary
episodes.overview: The ODNI is asked to facilitate the defection of a Russian FSB agent, but the agent's pregnant girlfriend throws a curve in the team's plans. Meanwhile, Christina goes off the books to reveal a mole in the CIA, and John's attempt to resolve his brother's problem with a local gang results in a spiritual crisis.

episodes.name: Solo
episodes.overview: During the team's efforts to thwart a Mejia weapons operation, Bryan is taken. As he relies on his ODNI training to survive, the team attempts a daring rescue. Meanwhile, Bryan and Asha take their relationship to the next level.

episodes.name: Leah
episodes.overview: A Mossad agent from Christina's past asks for her help and protection. First, they need to know who is trying to kill Leah, then the "why" becomes rather obvious.

episodes.name: Gone
episodes.overview: The spouse of an FBI agent is kidnapped.  Bryan wants nothing left to chance when Mexico demands the return of Mejia. Asha learns the identify of her friendly neighbor.

episodes.name: I Surrender
episodes.overview: In the season finale, the FBI threatens to remove Christina from command and Bryan and John lead a rogue mission that risks everything to stop Mejia's associates before.

episodes.name: S.E.R.E.
episodes.overview: Bryan Mills fights for his life inside a secret Mexican prison and plans a series of dangerous deals to put him on track for escape to the United States. But plans change when Mills and a young migrant girl are taken by human traffickers. Meanwhile, Christina Hart leverages her spycraft skills to obtain powerful new software that could locate Mills, and enlists two unlikely allies to aid in her mission to bring Mills home.

episodes.name: Quarry
episodes.overview: When a plane crashes carrying Bryan Mills and a key witness in a murder investigation, a wounded Mills must call upon the survival skills his father taught him to overcome the elements, find a way out of the woods and protect the witness from a lethal team of mercenaries on their tail. Meanwhile, Santana organizes a 'go big or go home' plan to locate the downed plane.

episodes.name: Hammurabi
episodes.overview: A laid-off worker kidnaps a high-powered accountant in revenge for his lost pension, and the team gets swept up in a case of class warfare when Bryan decides to help the kidnapper get justice.

episodes.name: OPSEC
episodes.overview: When the President's emergency "football" is stolen, Bryan and the team must recover it before classified national security measures fall into dangerous hands.

episodes.name: Absalom
episodes.overview: Santana must face her past when a foreign diplomat linked to a sex trafficking ring is kidnapped.

episodes.name: Charm School
episodes.overview: When the wife of a war hero senator is taken, Bryan and the team must determine if her disappearance was orchestrated by a foreign government or someone closer to home. Meanwhile, Christina's meeting with an old friend brings up painful memories.

episodes.name: Invitation Only
episodes.overview: Bryan and Santana must extract a nuclear physicist long thought dead, from a secret North Korean prison compound. Meanwhile, Kilroy faces a moral dilemma when Hart asks him to locate a criminal wanted by a foreign government.

episodes.name: Strelochnik
episodes.overview: Hart takes a solo mission to track down the mentor who betrayed her, and the team tries to locate her before it's too late.

episodes.name: Verum Nocet
episodes.overview: Hart must find a way to stop an exiled former journalist from leaking the names of government assets abroad before innocent lives are taken.

episodes.name: All About Eve
episodes.overview: Bryan must stop an act of biological terrorism when invasive species are stolen from the Global Seed Bank in Norway.

episodes.name: Password
episodes.overview: When a bomb goes off in Washington D.C., the team suspects an innocent man is being framed for the crime. Meanwhile, Kilroy tracks down a notorious hacker.

episodes.name: Imperium
episodes.overview: When a dangerous weapons dealer smuggles his wares into New York City, Bryan teams up with the FBI in a race to stop him before he reaches the safety of international waters.

episodes.name: ACGT
episodes.overview: When a CIA analyst's son is kidnapped, the team gets help from an unlikely source - another kidnapping victim. Meanwhile, Hart discovers the sinister motive behind the abductions.

episodes.name: Carapace
episodes.overview: Bryan must protect his cousin when hes targeted by a powerful crime syndicate. Meanwhile, Kilroy becomes a victim of blackmail

episodes.name: Render
episodes.overview: The daughter of a government official working overseas is taken, and an unexpected suspect derails Bryan's rescue operation.

episodes.name: Viceroy
episodes.overview: With Hart in grave danger, the team must find their own way to stop Ramsey before his plan to assassinate a senator starts a war with international terrorists.
